name: atrium
description:
You are standing in a large open-space atrium on the ground floor of the Red Gate offices.
The smell of coffee and smart people hangs in the air.

inventory.name: button
inventory.detailedDescription: If you push the button, perhaps a lift will come.

inventory.name: screen
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's cycling through news, traffic reports and the names of visitors for the day.
Apparently the A14 is broken again.
Ooh! It has your name up there too - 'Welcome $player'.
At least *someone* is expecting you.

missions.name: destroyscreen
missions.description: It screams 'destroy me' (or perhaps that's just a hidden violent streak you have) but you'd better be quick about it before anyone sees you.

reward.successMessage: Bad you! Somtimes you just have to resist your violent urges. You lose 25 points.
reward.failMessage: Never mind, it's probably better that way.

missions.name: sweetcoffee
missions.description: It's your first day in the office. Time for a boost. Get yourself a cup of sweet black coffee.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You managed to get your coffee, have 50 points!

name: atrium-seating
description: You're in the atrium seating area.

inventory.name: lawyer door
inventory.detailedDescription: Peering through the window you see people in suits looking busy and important.

inventory.name: chair
inventory.detailedDescription: You expect to find Morpheus sitting in it. It's surprisingly comfortable.

inventory.name: key
inventory.detailedDescription: It doesn't look familiar.

inventory.name: cake
inventory.detailedDescription: Mmmm tasty *and* healthy. If only there were more.

name: bike-ambulance
description: You're standing in the west car park by the bike ambulance.

inventory.name: rick
inventory.detailedDescription: Bikes is his thing.

missions.name: collectchrisbike
missions.description: Chris booked his bike in for repairs, you'll need to give Chris' bike to Rick.

reward.successMessage:
Nice one! Helping people out feels good, doesn't it.
Have 25 points.

name: buenosaires
description: You're in the Buenos Aires interview room.

name: camelids-a
description:
You're in Camelids-A. The UX team have filled the walls with post-its.
The table feels slightly too large for the room and it's a bit cramped in here.

name: camelids-b
description:
You're in Camelids-B. When not in use for small meetings, this room doubles as an in-office hairdressers salon.
You can still detect faint traces of hair clippings.

name: core-area-east
description: You're in the CORE (DevOps) area. Looks like things are running well here at the moment.

name: core-area-west
description: You're in the CORE Project Management zone. The team are battling the backlog of business requests and working their way to Cloud glory.

name: creative-agency-area
description: You're in the Agency Den. There's a tang of creativity (or is that printer toner?) in the air and the sound of clicks being converted to cash.

name: customer-delight-central
description:
You're in the middle of the Customer Delight team area.
According to the lights, the build status is currently green.
You fight the urge to play with the lights.

inventory.name: chris george
inventory.detailedDescription: Our resident head of Test.

inventory.name: mark
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Development.

inventory.name: jeff
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Software Engineering.

inventory.name: simon cromarty
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Project Management.

name: customer-delight-east
description:
You're at the Eastern end of the Customer Delight team area.
To the West you can see a glass wall with LED build status lights. You feel somewhat drawn to their glow.

name: customer-delight-management-area
description:
You're in the dead-zone of Customer Delight between the glass wall and Jellyfish.
There's a vacuum where the CEO and PA's used to sit although it's adequately filled by the presence of James Dening when he's around.

inventory.name: james dening
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Sales. Like a 6-foot-plus tigger.

inventory.name: wig
inventory.detailedDescription: A disturbing remnant from the sales team beating their records and making their management team wear fancy dress.

inventory.name: alan
inventory.detailedDescription: The master of Customer Delight.

name: customer-delight-north
description: You're in the Northern part of the Customer Delight team area.

name: customer-delight-south
description: You're in the Southern part of the Customer Delight team area.

name: customer-delight-south-west
description: You're in the South-West corner of the Customer Delight team area.

inventory.name: jonathan
inventory.detailedDescription: Self-confessed Eeyore. Kick-ass tester and PM.

inventory.name: alice
inventory.detailedDescription:
A source of endless positivity, even when the world is falling apart.
Probably your best best for survival in a zombie apocalypse.

inventory.name: chris moore
inventory.detailedDescription: Endlessly cheerful security guru extraordinaire. Keep him away from Rum and pub floors.

missions.name: fixchrisbike
dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I've just got a new bike but it's not set up properly.'
'I've booked it in for repairs but I'm flat-out all day today.'
'Could you do me a favour and take it for a service?'
'You'll need to search through the racks for it I'm afraid.'
'Oops. You'll need the key. Here you go.'

delivers.name: bike key
delivers.detailedDescription: You'll need this to shift Chris' bike.

reward.successMessage: Chris hands you a bike key.

name: customer-delight-west
description: You're at the West end of the Customer Delight team area.

name: darth-vader
description:
You're in the Darth-Vader meeting room. Another great space tucked out of the way behind facilities this time.
There's a great view up the road out of the business park.

name: east-bike-racks
description: You're standing at the South-East corner of the the office building.

inventory.name: bike rack
inventory.detailedDescription: There's dozens of bikes here. Are you looking for any in particular?

inventory.name: bike
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like Chris' new bike.

attributes.defaultResult:
You hop on the bike and pedal it around for a while.
It's probably best not to get caught on it.

name: east-car-park
description:
You're standing in the East car park. In the far corner you can see an area used for waste storage.
To the South are bike racks and a path running across the back of the Red Gate office building.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the East corridor of the ground floor.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor-north-east
description: You're in the North end of the ground floor East corridor.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor-north-west
description: You're standing in the corridor just outside the post room.

name: east-end-south-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the East end of the South corridor on the ground floor.

inventory.name: door
inventory.detailedDescription: If you open the door, you'll probably set off an alarm.

name: east-south-end-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the South end of the East corridor on the ground floor.

name: enterprise-meeting-room
description: You're in the Enterprise meeting room. You peer through the window at the people coming and going from the office.

name: facilities-area
description: You're in the Facilities team area. They work tirelessly to keep the building running, clean, safe and maintained. Just don't annoy them, you'll regret it.

name: finance-area
description: You're in the Finance team area. You really need to be nice to this lot. They sort out your pay and expenses as well as all the rest of the cash running through this place.

inventory.name: black book
inventory.detailedDescription: This one's a bit of an eye-opener about the challenges of theft in offices. Probably worth a read.

missions.name: learntosteal
missions.description:
In any office environment you must exercise caution. Even trusted colleagues may be less scrupulous than you think, don't be a victim and above all, keep your money hidden.
It appears less scrupulous players might be tempted to steal from their colleagues!

reward.successMessage: Interesting. You've learned some new stealth skills.

name: first-floor-back-stairs-east
description: You're standing on the north-east staircase.

name: first-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're halfway up the west fire escape staircase.

name: first-floor-cubby-hole
description:
You're in the First floor cubby hole.
The area is lined with whiteboards and there are assorted chairs and bean bags scattered around.

inventory.name: beanbag
inventory.detailedDescription: Very comfy. Not so easy to get out of once you're in place though

name: first-floor-cubicle
description: You're in a first floor toilet cubicle.

inventory.name: security article
inventory.detailedDescription: It's entitled 'Take security in your STRIDE'.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned a basic mnemonic for considering software security.

name: first-floor-fire-escape
description:
You're standing on the first floor of the rear fire escape. You probably shouldn't be here without a good reason.
The wind howls across the steel deck. Peering cautiously down over the railings you can see the smoking area and bike racks.

name: first-floor-landing-central
description: You're on the first floor landing.

name: first-floor-landing-east
description:
You're at the East end of the first floor landing.
Through the window to the East you can see some of the sales team relaxing and playing on an XBox.

name: first-floor-landing-west
description:
You're at the West end of the first floor landing.
Peering over the balcony you see people wandering about their business down below.

name: first-floor-lift
description:
You're in the first floor lift.
The cool blue-white of the LED lighting gives you a somewhat sickened pallor in the full mirror.
You try not to keep staring at yourself

name: first-floor-toilet
description:
You're in the first floor toilet.
It's a lot like all the others here although there's a subtle difference in colour.

inventory.name: soap
inventory.detailedDescription: After careful inspection, you figure out where to push it and how to get soap out.

name: fishing
description:
You're in the Fishing meeting room. Now you really know how a goldfish feels.
You feel you're being watched.

name: flowers-a
description:
You're in the Flowers A meeting room. It's bright & airy in here.
If you want to use the AV equipment, forget it. Use the TV instead.

name: flowers-b
description: You're in the Flowers B meeting room. This is a great medium-sized room that often gets overlooked. Possibly because it's regularly closed off to be used for massages.

name: graffiti-a
description: You're in the Graffiti-A meeting room. The decor is amazing but there's very little natural light.

name: graffiti-b
description: You're in the Graffiti-B meeting room. It's all bright and shiny.

inventory.name: torch
inventory.detailedDescription: Great for when it's dark. It looks like it'll work too!

name: ground-floor-back-stair-east
description:
You're standing at the bottom of the north-east staircase.
There's an air of foreboding down here. People don't come down here very often unless they're lost.

name: ground-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're in the bottom of the west fire escape stairs.

inventory.name: key
inventory.detailedDescription: It unlocks coffee machines.

name: ground-floor-fire-escape
description:
You're at the bottom of the rear fire escape staircase.
You're surrounded by large gas and water pipes leading in and out of the building.

name: ground-floor-toilet
description:
You stare at yourself in the bathroom mirror and muse over the form and design of the soap dispensers.
It's probably not socially acceptable to hang around in here all day though.

name: ground-floor-toilet-cubicle
description: You're standing in a nice clean cubicle. Fortunately the previous occupant remembered to flush.

inventory.name: solid article
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's entitled 'Do Me a SOLID' (that's a terrible pun for an article in a toilet, right?)
and describes SOLID coding principles (something this game doesn't always adhere to very well).

missions.name: lotleasteregg
missions.description: Hmmm Interesting. It's available online.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned the basics on how to develop good software architecture.

name: incidentals-blinkpipe
description: You're in the space between Core and Finance occupied by the Blinkpipe team. Some of them look oddly familiar although you rarely actually come into contact with them.

name: is-area
description: You're in the IS area. The team here keep this show on the road. Anything you need, they can usually get it or fix it for you.

name: jellyfish-meeting-room
description:
You're in Jellyfish meeting room. The carpet in here is a rather vivid green.
Through the window to the north you can see people scurrying up and down the stairs trying not to spill their coffee.

name: kitchen-ground-floor
description: You're in the atrium kitchen.

inventory.name: bottle
inventory.detailedDescription: A large milk bottle

inventory.name: milk
inventory.detailedDescription: Enough for a few lattes.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough here for $charges $chargeUnit of coffee

inventory.name: cup
inventory.detailedDescription: Just the right size for a decent brew.

inventory.name: coco pops
inventory.detailedDescription: They're going a bit soggy but still tasty.

inventory.name: sugar
inventory.detailedDescription: Not so good for the waistline but sugary, sweet and tasty.

inventory.name: machine
inventory.detailedDescription: Given the right ingedients it makes a variety of coffees.

missions.name: beans
missions.displayName: fill the coffee machine with beans
missions.description: Before you can get any coffee, this machine needs beans.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You got the coffee machine working, have 50 points!

name: lawyer-lobby
description:
You're in the lobby of the resident law firm.
There's an air of bureaucracy, suits and books to the place.

name: library
description: You're in the atrium Library.

inventory.name: table
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's custom-made with a fake rock underneath and a sword-sized slot in the top.
A plaque on it says something about a billion dollars.

inventory.name: bookcase
inventory.detailedDescription: Books on everything from travel to SQL server and from sales to C#.

attributes.extendedinventorydescription: Amongst the hundreds of pages of reading material available you find $inventory that may be of interest.

inventory.name: large book
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a book on how to sell software in a friendly way.

inventory.name: manual
inventory.description: maintenance manual for the coffee machines
inventory.detailedDescription: It includes schematics and wiring diagrams for how to repair and maintain coffee machines.

missions.name: repaircoffeemachine
missions.description:
Blah blah blah wiring blah locks blah coffee blah beans blah milk blah.
Did you know you can use the verbs repair and break?
If something is broken try repairing it. A combination of the two actions may sometimes be a faster route to some of your goals.
Try this out on the coffee machine. (Just don't get caught breaking stuff deliberately).

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned how to repair a coffee machine.

inventory.name: small book
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a book on why not all customers are created equal.

inventory.name: sword
inventory.detailedDescription: It's flimsy and fake-looking but kind of fun.

inventory.name: guitar
inventory.detailedDescription: The strings are a bit tatty but it's mostly in tune.

attributes.defaultResult: You attempt to strum a few notes but virtual music doesn't seem to be your forte.

name: lift-ground-floor
description:
The lift doors automatically close behind you. You're in the ground floor lift. It's quite dark in here and every now and again a disembodied voice chants something about electrical faults.
You contemplate pressing the alarm button but it'll only route to a call centre somewhere.

inventory.name: exit button
inventory.detailedDescription: If you push the exit, you should be able to get out again.

name: machine-room-east
description: Now you're definitely in a sensitive area. Racks of servers hum away. Fortunately most of them are just for testing, we use the cloud you know!

inventory.name: spy
inventory.detailedDescription: Very shifty. I'm sure nobody would notice if he disappeared.

inventory.name: disk
inventory.detailedDescription: Pretty sure it belongs to Red Gate.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You killed the spy! Have 50 points.

name: machine-room-west
description:
You're in the IS storage area.
You're not meant to be in here unaccompanied I think. There are cables, wires and spare pieces of hardware arrayed around you.

name: marketing
description: You're in the Marketing area.

name: mercedes
description: You're in the Mercedes meeting room. An odd-shaped room that's rarely used by any but the locals.

name: northwest-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the North-West corridor of the ground floor.

name: office-front
description:
You're standing outside the front of the Red Gate offices. The sun is shining and the business park security and maintenance crews are all busy doing their regular rounds.
There are car parks to both the East and West. To the north is the main road that runs through the estate.

inventory.name: ice cream man
inventory.detailedDescription: A random guy who occasionally has ice cream for sale.

sells.name: ice cream
sells.detailedDescription: Ice cream makes a great gift!

name: opportunities-cubbyhole
description: You're in a dead-end room full of clutter in the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: nerf gun
inventory.detailedDescription: It's loaded! :D An unlucky shot with this could take someone's eye out.

inventory.name: drums
inventory.detailedDescription: An electronic drum kit, cool!

attributes.defaultResult: You bash the drums for a while. Your sense of rhythm feels a bit off today.

name: opportunities-north
description: You're in north end of the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: james moore
inventory.detailedDescription: He pwns the Opportunities division.

name: opportunities-north-corridor
description: You're in a corridor at the north end of the opportunities and ventures area.

name: opportunities-north-east-corridor
description: You're at the end of a corridor in the northern part of the opportunities and ventures area.

name: opportunities-south
description: You're in south end of the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: google glasses
inventory.detailedDescription:
These are pretty hard to get hold of!
Wearing these makes you an instant hipster.

attributes.defaultResult:
Nah, they don't really suit you.
You take them off again and blink a few times to recover your near-field vision.

name: paint-pots
description:
You're in the Paint Pots meeting room. The lack of visible light adds to the sense of foreboding.
You feel like this is a room specially reserved for difficult HR conversations. You'd be wrong of course!

name: peacock
description: You're in the Peacock meeting room. Other than meetings, this room doubles as a miniature recording studio.

name: people-team-area
description: You're in the People Team area. For such an overworked group they're always available and happy to help.

name: people-team-north
description: You're on the Northern edge of the People Team area.

name: people-team-north-west
description: You're in the North-West corner of the People Team area.

name: people-team-water-cooler
description: You're stood by a water cooler on the west wing of the second floor. A corridor leads North and East. There are team areas to the South and meeting rooms to the West.

name: pioneer
description: You're in the Pioneer meeting room. The acoustics in here seem very strange.

inventory.name: plain key
inventory.detailedDescription: Just a plain key.

name: poppy
description: You're in the Poppy meeting room. The AV equipment in here could use some love.

inventory.name: projector
inventory.detailedDescription: When these things work they're great.

missions.name: repairprojector
missions.description: The projector's broken, someone needs to fix it.

reward.successMessage:
Great job! Next time there's a meeting in here, nobody will curse the previous occupants.
Curses can only lead to bad things!
Have 25 points.

inventory.name: simon galbraith
inventory.detailedDescription: He runs the show.

inventory.name: sketchbook
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like it contains all Simon's plans.

missions.name: retrievedisk
dialogue:
'Hi $player, welcome to Red Gate'
'We have a problem.'
'Someone's stealing our data. Can you track it down and bring it back to me?'
'Have you found my missing data yet?'

reward.successMessage:
Simon says 'Amaaazing!' and waves his arms in a CEO-like gesture.
Congratulations. You retrieved the stolen hard drive! Have 50 points and a cash bonus.

name: post-room
description: You're in the post room.

name: punts
description: You're in the Punts meeting room. It's probably the narrowest meeting room in the building. Just room for 2 and a PC.

name: reception
description: You are stood by the big red reception desk in the Red Gate office atrium.

inventory.name: vic
inventory.detailedDescription:
Well, receptionist is an understatement to be honest.
She looks out for everyone here. Be nice to her.

missions.name: keyfob
missions.description: Vic has a key fob for you.
dialogue:
Good morning $player.
Welcome aboard! Here's your key fob, you'll need this to get in and out of some parts of the office.

delivers.name: keyfob
delivers.detailedDescription: Carrying this ensures you have access to the office whenever you need.

missions.name: vicsbook
missions.displayName: give Vic something interesting to read
missions.description: Vic has a parcel for you but she'd like something to read first.

delivers.name: parcel
delivers.detailedDescription: It's got a sticker saying 'fragile' on it. Hopefully there's something useful inside.

inventory.name: bag
inventory.detailedDescription: The label says 'Finest Software Development Coffee Beans'

inventory.name: beans
inventory.detailedDescription: Development fuel. Almost enough to last a day here.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough for about $charges $chargeUnit of coffee

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. Vic likes the book! Have 50 points.

name: rest-area-ground-floor
description: You're in the ground floor rest area.

inventory.name: hammock
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a bit of a pig to climb into but well-worth the effort for a rest.

inventory.name: machine
inventory.detailedDescription: An almost endless supply of snacks and treats!

delivers.name: chocolate
delivers.detailedDescription: Mmmm tasty and loaded with calories.

delivers.name: crisps
delivers.detailedDescription: Sadly they're not Salt & Vinegar flavour - but they'll do in an emergency.

name: room-404
description: You're in Room 404. It's like a giant 'notfound' error staring at you from beneath a bowler hat.

inventory.name: brick
inventory.detailedDescription: This would make quite a good cudgel but it's likely to break.

name: rubbish-bins
description: You're rooting around in the Red Gate rubbish bins. What depths have you stooped to?

inventory.name: skip
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's full of rubbish.
It looks like a great place to hide things you don't want found!

attributes.defaultResult:
You clamber around in the skip.
After putting your hand in something slimy and nearly impaling yourself on a broken chair you decide to climb back out.

name: sales-break-out
description: You're stood in a small break out area.

name: sales-main
description:
You're in the main sales and marketing area.
There's a low level hum of telephone conversation.

inventory.name: alex
inventory.detailedDescription: Can haz mor Accountz.

inventory.name: will
inventory.detailedDescription: Don't ask about the Oompa-loompa costume.

inventory.name: james king
inventory.detailedDescription: He sells SQL Monitor like a mo'fo'.

inventory.name: simon johnson
inventory.detailedDescription: He's a master of selling, seems like he's been here forever and now he's taking on Germany!

missions.name: hidejameswig
dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I've got a job for you'
'Earlier this year, James had all the sales managers wear fancy dress as a 'reward' for the team hitting their record numbers.'
'It was a great move but I swear we don't want a repeat of the horror of James in drag again.'
'Can you hide his wig for us? (preferably somewhere out of the building!)'

reward.successMessage:
Great stuff! No more managers in drag.
I think James might be a little disappointed with you but Simon will have appreciated it.
Have 25 points.

inventory.name: cassi
inventory.detailedDescription: She kicks ass on accounts, like many of the sales team, she's one of the reasons this place can afford to pay us all.

name: sales-north
description:
You're at the North end of the sales and marketing area.
To the North is a door. East is the marketing area and West are some recreational spaces.

name: sales-seating
description: You're in a small seating area. Peering down through the windows to the West you can see the atrium. To the North is a meeting room.

inventory.name: xbox
inventory.detailedDescription: Fancy a game of Forza?

attributes.defaultResult: After a few minutes of button-mashing you think it's probably time to go and do something useful instead.

name: sales-south
description: You're at the south end of the sales and marketing area.

name: second-floor-back-stairs-east
description:
You're at the top of the Eastern back staircase. This is very much a path less-travelled.
From here you can take a short-cut down to the Sales and Marketing teams or South to Finance and Facilities.

name: second-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're standing at the top of the west fire escape staircase.

name: second-floor-cubicle
description:
You're in a toilet cubicle. You feel even more disoriented.
The toilet is still refilling from a previous flush. You might need to hang around for a while if you plan on using this one.

inventory.name: boy scout article
inventory.detailedDescription: It's entitled 'The Boy Scout Rule'.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned a simple approach to keeping code clean.

name: second-floor-east-corridor
description: You're in the East corridor on the second floor. Domain of all things IS.

name: second-floor-fire-escape
description: You're on the second floor of the rear fire escape. It's windy up here.

name: second-floor-kitchen
description: You're in the second floor kitchen. There's a space where once a coffee machine sat but not much else here to tempt you to hand around upstairs now.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

name: second-floor-landing-central
description: You're in the middle of the second floor landing. From here you have a great view of the Autonomy Ant Farm over the road.

name: second-floor-landing-east
description: You're at the east end of the second floor landing. Peering through the window to the East, you can just about make out the facilities team on the other side of the glass.

name: second-floor-landing-west
description: You're at the West end of the second floor landing. Peering over the balcony you consider throwing something down. If only there was a slide here.

name: second-floor-lift
description:
Ding. Second floor.
Same lift, same mirror, same eerie lighting. Or is it?

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-central
description: You're part-way along a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor. There are meeting rooms to the East and West.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-central
description: You're in a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-east
description: You're at a bend in a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor. There are meeting rooms to the North and East.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-end
description: You're in a North-South corridor at the North-West corner of the second floor. To the North is a staircase leading down.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-south
description:
You're at the South end of a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor.
There's meeting room to the West. To the east is a curved glass partition behind which are printers and a stationery cupboard.

name: second-floor-printer-area
description: You're in a small glass-walled corner bounded by corridors.

name: second-floor-reception
description: You're standing in the former reception area on the second floor. A CCTV camera looms over the desk area.

name: second-floor-seating-area-east
description:
You're in the East end of the second floor seating area.
You could stand here for hours reading the giant wall of post-it notes trying to spot the duplicates.

name: second-floor-seating-area-west
description: You're in the West end of the second floor seating area.

name: second-floor-toilet
description: You're in a bathroom. You can't quite remember what floor you're on. Do those soap dispensers look different to you?

inventory.name: hand dryer
inventory.detailedDescription: These things are good but loud.

attributes.defaultResult:
You wave your hands under the dryer for a minute or so.
You feel like your hands have been assaulted by a horde of angels.

name: second-floor-west-corridor
description:
You're in a short corridor that runs East-West. To the East is the second floor reception area.
To the north is a printer area that also houses a stationary cupboard. To the west lies the People team (and more winding corridors).

name: servery-back-corridor
description: You're in the back corridor of the SQL Servery. There's a slight smell of industrial kitchens here.

name: servery-kitchen
description: You're in the SQL Servery kitchen.

inventory.name: marmite
inventory.detailedDescription: Love it or hate it - your choice, but it is full of b-vitamins

name: servery-main
description: You're in SQL Servery. The smell of food and buzz of conversation are almost enough to overload your senses.

inventory.name: soup
inventory.detailedDescription: Butternut squash and coconut.

name: servery-north-west
description:
You're in the North-West end of the servery.
There's a wall full of postcards and a small kitchen area here.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

inventory.name: shreddies
inventory.detailedDescription: Shreddies... 'Cereal in the daytime?!' wow, I've never had that before.

inventory.name: postcard
inventory.detailedDescription: It says thanks for being great, Chris! (there are loads of others with similar thank-yous)

name: servery-salad-bar
description:
You're standing by the SQL Servery salad bar.
To the East is the sales and marketing area, to the West is the main area of the SQL Servery.

inventory.name: salad
inventory.detailedDescription: Mixed leaves, some cheese, beans, beetroot. All with a French dressing.

name: servery-south-west
description: You're in the South-West end of the servery. The lights of network switches and wiring looms blink silently at you, enticing you to play with the wires.

name: shower-ground-floor
description: You're in the ground floor showers. There's a lingering smell of deodorant, damp and cyclist sweat.

name: signpost
description: You're in the SignPost meeting room.

name: smoking-area
description: You're outside the back of the office under the fire escape.

name: snorting-horses
description:
You're in the Snorting Horses meeting room.
There's a great view out of the windows. The table has been rendered to look like straw, one wall is covered in rosettes whilst the other mixes acoustic treatment with some rather alarming horse-head-shaped lighting.
Overall there's something deeply unsettling about spending time alone in here.

name: southeast-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the South-East corridor of the ground floor.

name: southwest-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the South-West corridor of the ground floor.

name: spiderman
description:
You're in the Spiderman meeting room. (Or is that Spider-man?) There are large windows on 2 walls.
You feel somewhat exposed here

name: stairs-first-floor
description: You're halfway up the main office staircase.

name: stairs-ground-floor
description: You're standing at the foot of the stairs.

name: stairs-second-floor
description: You're standing at the top of the main staircase The view's great from up here.

inventory.name: amanda
inventory.detailedDescription: It's well-worth helping her out, you never know when you'll need her support.

missions.name: teachprojectorrepair
missions.description: Amanda knows how to fix stuff.
dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I don't suppose you could fix the projector in Poppy for me could you?'
'It's pretty simple, here's a bulb. You'll need to do a bit of a repair on it as well though.'

delivers.name: bulb
delivers.detailedDescription: A critical part of a projector. It's fragile, don't drop it!

reward.successMessage: Amanda hands you a projector bulb.

name: support-east
description:
You're in support area.
From here you can make rude gestures and wave through the window at passers-by on the stairs.

name: support-west
description: You're in support area.

inventory.name: chris allen
inventory.detailedDescription: Support and music skills. What more could you need?

name: thinking-hats
description: You're in the Thinking Hats meeting room. The seats in here are really tricky to pick up and move and it's oddly chilly. Perhaps it's haunted?

name: top-fire-escape
description:
You're at the top of the rear fire escape. From here you have clear access to the roof.
It's a long way down!

name: traffic-jam-meeting-room
description:
You're in the 'Traffic Jam' meeting room.
There's quite a good view outside from here although it does feel like a bit of a fishbowl.

name: war-room
description:
You're in the War Room. Once upon a time this was a little-used library. It's a long narrow space that's not used for management stand-ups.
The walls are filled with long-forgotten organisational restructuring plans.

name: waste-area
description: You're by a locked gate. On the far side are a series of waste containers full of carboard boxes, broken furniture and kitchen leftovers.

inventory.name: pawel jonczak
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the hidden heroes of our catering team.

inventory.name: key
inventory.detailedDescription: This looks like the key to the waste area gate.

inventory.name: waste gate
inventory.detailedDescription: You've always been curious what interesting things get thrown in here.

name: web-meeting-room
description: You're in the Web meeting room.

name: west-bike-racks
description: You're standing at the South-West corner of the the office building.

name: west-car-park
description:
You're standing in the West car park.
To the South are bike racks and a path running across the back of the Red Gate office building.

name: west-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the West corridor of the ground floor.

name: west-end-south-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the West end of the South corridor on the ground floor.

name: windows-meeting-room
description:
You're in the 'Windows' meeting room.
It's a bit cramped in here and one of the walls is oddly curved wall for no obvious reason.
